Translations.Text: Ni$ mmaalken, uqbel ik, deg imazanen. Ooi$ lmudda i wid ijehlen, sinna, Iife$ ten. A yaaaqeb iW imiren

Day Win Ibedden, ar yal amdan, $ef wayen iksebâ€¦? Curken aS i Oebbi. Ini: "semmit asen! Ne$, ad aS temlem ayen ur Ieoi di tmurt? Ne$ d ismawen n tkerkas"? Xaii! Wid ijehlen, aaobent pen nncub nnsen. Ppuveoofen seg ubrid. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai w ara t inhun
Fellasen aaaqeb, di tmeddurt n ddunit. Aaaqeb n laxert, s tidep, aaer. Ur sain ara ten ifukken, seg ufus n Oebbi
Amek tga Loennet i ippuweaaden i wid ieezzben: ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen, lqut is akked tili s, d imezgiyen. D tagi ay d taggara n wid ieezzben. Taggara ijehliyen, d times
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, ad feoeen s wayen i k d irsen. Illa wayen ugin kra ikabaren. Ini: "pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Oebbi, ur aS pcarake$. Pnuju$ $uoeS, tu$alin iw $uoeS
Akka ay t id Nessers, d uuwab, s taaoabt. Ma teddiv d lhawiyya nnsen, deffir tisin n tussna $uoek, ur k ipfukku bab ne$ asettao, seg ufus n Oebbi
